column1: * 1967 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Mr Joukes.
* 1973 - J.R.R. Tolkien takes a holiday to visit friends in Bournemouth. He would die there September 2 later.
* 1977 - Mythcon 8 at wikipedia:University of San Diego
* 1981 - Tom Shippey reviews The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien for The Times Literary Supplement.
* 1982 - The seventh episode of the new version of the The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series) of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC.
* 2010 - The Tolkien Societys Southern Hemisphere seminar: "Tolkiens Odysseys - Middle-earth and Beyond".
* 2018 - The Hobbit Facsimile Gift Edition will be published.
